timestamp.data: contains further xml nodes pertaining to the command or message type

primary_communication.backup_communication:
(comma deliminated list)
----Add Pending Device ---- cmd: AddPendingDevice
--- Remove Device --- cmd: RemoveDevice
---- Heartbeat --- cmd: DeviceHeartbeat
----Device Command ---- cmd: DeviceCommand
(same variable XML as data tag)
---Device state change --- cmd: DeviceStateChanged
---- remove UI device ---- cmd: RemoveUIDevice
---- Add UI Device ---- cmd: AddUIDevice
********Outgoing From HUB*********
-----Update Device Settings--- cmd: DeviceSettingsUpdate
-----New device presence---- cmd: NewDevicePresence
-----UI Device Message --- cmd: UIDeviceMessage
-----UI Device Bool --- cmd: UIDeviceBool
(0 or 1);
